Name: NativeInitializeAnimation
Description: It is called once when the animation instance is created, typically after the owning SkeletalMeshComponent is initialized but before the first frame update.

Name: NativeUpdateAnimation
Description: Called every frame (similar to Tick() for Actors). Use it for real-time updates (e.g., velocity, jump states).

Name: TryGetPawnOwner
Description: Returns the APawn that owns the USkeletalMeshComponent associated with the UAnimInstance.
